reviews.review:
Game is mostly fun but there are some cons:

- Really toxic community
- Developers are not listening to their players
- Right now game is going throught hacker epidemic (1/3 of the games are with hackers)

Overall recommended but before buying contact your psychiatrist.
Polecam grę mechanika nie jest trudna. Dla osób ze słabymi nerwami ostrzegam, na początku też się cykałem ale gra niejest straszna.

Las cosas buenas que puedo decir son, que tiene una buena variedad de mapas y de personajes, es muy divertido jugar con amigos en partidas privadas y en team de superviviente, y un sistema aleatorio de obtencion de objetos que hacen que junto a la cantidad de personajes, y habilidades variadas, cada partida sea diferente...

lo malo es que deben hacer un balance correcto de habilidades, aun que admito que eso es dificil, pues casi siempre se juegan las mismas habilidades en todas, sobre todo los asesinos, y lo otro malo que hay es una parte de la comunidad, que o bien solo buscan puntos ( asesinos que campean o tunelean ) o molestar ( survivors que hacen teabag o probocan al asesino para intentar humillarle ). Sobre todo lo segundo es lo que mas molesta y provoca mal ambiente en algunas partidas.
Dead by Rin.
就是好玩。被杀的感觉 真的是太棒了！！！！！！！！！！！！！！
这款游戏很不错，值得玩，也是很耐玩的一款游戏，但是，自从地图改版，缩小了范围之后，相对于刚出来这游戏的时候，没有那么特别好玩。希望能改回大地图的时代，这样玩杀机的人我觉得可能会更多。最近更新的杀人鬼屠夫，深受大多数玩家喜爱，希望以后出更多的新屠夫，增加游戏乐趣。

T H E  B E S T  G A M E  I N  T H E  W O R L D  :З
前面确实是恐怖游戏，等玩到后面的时候完全就是娱乐游戏了，和其他朋友一起玩的时候完完全全就是放松的游戏了

首先，这是小号，大号2000H，虽然这个游戏大家产生了对制作组的爱恨情仇，但是这个游戏确实是这类型的创始者，其他什么的，呵呵，虽然别的游戏也有玩，但是没事想玩游戏的时候第一个游戏必然会想到杀鸡。
其次，希望制作组能把服务器弄好，匹配机制弄好，好友系统弄好，段位机制弄好，匹配时间弄好，各方面玩家的心声你们要懂得看，懂得处理。中国玩家的钱虽然好赚，但也同样不是那么好赚得。
最后，制作组敢不敢把我的大号解封？
Беги

Игра сама по себе в начале очень стремная. Но потом это уже становится игрой *фарма*, по скольку ты понимаешь, что без нужных навыков ты - полностью бесполезен. Сама игра очень динамичная(особенно за выжившего) но баланс очень тонкий, по скольку маньяк всегда доминирует, и сбежать в нынешнее время очень и очень сложно(особенно после нерфа аптечки и инста хила).

한국에서는 왜 비주류 게임인지 의문일정도로 재밌다. 처음할 때야 BGM이나 디자인 등의 컨셉 때문에 무서울 뿐이지 좀 실력 쌓이고 자세히 들여다 보면 귀염둥이 살인마와 손발 척척 맞는 팀원 셋과 함께 플레이를 즐기는 자신을 볼 수 있을거다.

good game

Rusyadan Selamlar Canlar. Hani hep hayal ederdiniz birisinden saklanayım birisi bulsun küçüken çoçukluk yaşlarımızda bir çoğumuz oynamışdır birisi gizleniyor diyeri buluyor. Bu oyunda onun korku oyunu gibi yapmışlar. Online oyunudur arkadaşlarınızla çok keyfli ve adrenalin yaşamak istiyorsanız şiddetle tavsiye ederim. Hala oynamayan kaldıysa düşünmeden oynamasını öneriyorum. İstersenis gizlenen siz olursunuz yada isterseniz siz herkese korku salıyorsunuz. Gizlenerek motorları çalştırmanız ve kapıyı açarak kaçmanız gerekli buda oynadıgınız arkadaşlarınızla el ele vererek birlikde oynayarak yapmanız gereken bir oyundur. Parasının hakkını fazlasıyla veriyor.
Herkese İyi Oyunlar

Game makes me hate my life even more
is good gem

Solid game, overall a fun experience and even more so with friends.

Atmosphere when you first start out is tense, you don't know whos coming for you... could it be The Trapper? Could every bush you walk in leave you with broken ankles and fear as your heartbeat pulses louder and louder? or Wraith, never knowing or expecting him to suddenly appear beside you other then the sound of a bell tolling for thee.

Each killer has the same goal but the way they do it is different. Trapper and Hag both place traps but how they use them is different :)

Once you get into the later stages of the games you can choose how you build your survivor or killer with different perks and items/addons... affecting how you go through the match.

Overall its been a fun experience and am glad to have owned the game since it came out.

Game is a mess. Toxic community, long queue times, perks that ruin the game, more micro transactions than actual content. Owned this game for years with the mindset that the game would get better with time, but every time I give it another shot it seems to be in a worse state than when I last played.
